public_speech: To ask the Secretary of State for Business and Trade, what discussions he has had with the Small Business Commissioner on the (a) awareness and (b) use of mediation in the small business sector.

relevance_summary.summary: The MP asking the question has connections to organizations and roles related to dispute resolution and mediation. He is the Chair, Director, and Trustee of CEDR, an organization involved in mediation, though unpaid. Additionally, he chairs the Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) Taskforce for electricity network infrastructure, also unpaid. These roles are relevant given the question is about mediation awareness and use in the small business sector.

relevant_interests.reason: The question is about the awareness and use of mediation in the small business sector, and the MP holds an unpaid role as Chair, Director, and Trustee of an organization (CEDR) that is directly involved in dispute resolution, including mediation. This connection makes the interest relevant to the question of mediation in the small business sector.

regmem_entry.content: Chair, (Director & Trustee) of Centre for Effective Dispute Resolution Limited (CEDR). This is an unpaid role.

details.value: Chair, (Director & Trustee) of Centre for Effective Dispute Resolution Limited (CEDR). This is an unpaid role.

relevant_interests.reason: The question is about mediation use in the small business sector, and the MP is the Chair of the Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) Taskforce. This role, although unpaid and specific to electricity network infrastructure, is directly related to mediation and dispute resolution practices, which is relevant to the MP's question on the awareness and use of mediation in small businesses.

regmem_entry.content: Chair of The Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) Taskforce for Electricity Network Infrastructure, Department for Energy Security and Net Zero. This is an unpaid role.
